title: [GAMEPLAY] Snow Day Malzahar Backing Animation Missing Texture
body: Recently played a bot game with a couple of my friends and picked Malzahar and his Snow Day skin. During my first back, I noticed that the poro who Malzahar turns into a void-ling was missing his texture. I thought it was odd and asked my friends if he he looked different. They described him as totally blue, which is exactly what I saw. I took a gif of the backing animation, which is the gyazo link. Wasn't sure if I should have posted this here, since it IS a bug, but it isn't crashing my game or anything. {{champion:90}} peace out chicken scouts

replies.body:
Hiya QueenofNuggets! 

Thanks for the report! It's awesome to have a gif for reference! ^-^ We're aware of the report - appears to be a missing texture - and are working on a fix!
